mapper.select: SELECT pr.property_id, pr.device_id, pr.property_value, pr.ts , pr.property_label, pm.model_label FROM t_device_property_report pr LEFT JOIN t_model_property mp ON mp.id = pr.property_id LEFT JOIN t_product_model pm ON mp.product_model_id = pm.id WHERE pr.device_id = #{deviceId} AND pm.deleted = 0 ORDER by pr.property_id
mapper.insert:
insert into t_device_property_report ( device_id, property_id, property_label,property_value, ts) values
( #{item.deviceId}, #{item.propertyId}, #{item.propertyLabel},#{item.propertyValue}, #{item.ts})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE property_value =VALUES( property_value ),ts =VALUES(ts)
